https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ciSSrQt5HjUM8SicA05nZpo4oda.jpg In spring, a girl leaves the island of Hokkaido to attend university in Tokyo. Once there, she is asked to reveal why she wanted to go there in the first place. April Story
